ReactorEE.simulator

Class ReactorUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • ReactorEE.simulator.ReactorUtils

  • public class ReactorUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    ReactorUtils contains utilities for the game such as: - Return a fresh Plant Object, fully initialised.
    Author:
    WillFrew

      • setFailureRateOfFalableComponents

        public void setFailureRateOfFalableComponents(Plant p,
                                     int initialFailRate,
                                     int maxFailRate)
        Change the rate of failure of fallible components to a specified level.
        Parameters:
        p - The plant to change the failure rate evenly of all fallible components
        initialFailRate - The rate of failure that the components will start with. Cant be higher than maxFailRate
        maxFailRate - The maximum rate of failure that the components will achieve. Binds more strongly than initialFailRate.
